description: This file implements the core functions for the Web Status Atom Table Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It is part of a larger web server or application system, specifically managing the Web Status Atom Table resource.

classes.name: WEB_STATUS_ATOM_TABLE_OBJECT
classes.description: Main object representing the Web Status Atom Table, containing function pointers and relevant data fields.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE WebSatoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs a new Web Status Atom Table Object, allocating memory, initializing fields, and setting function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebSatoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys and cleans up the Web Status Atom Table Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebSatoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary subordinate objects required by the Web Status Atom Table Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS WebSatoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Web Status Atom Table Object, setting its essential member variables and function pointers.
